title: Lesson 1
description: Identify major world capitals and their corresponding countries.
content: Welcome to the study of world capitals. A capital city is the municipality exercising primary status in a country, state, province, or other administrative region, usually as its seat of government. In this lesson, we will focus on some of the most prominent capital cities across different continents.

questions.prompt: Which city is the capital of France?
What is the capital of Japan?
Which of these cities is the capital of Brazil?
What is the capital of Egypt?
Canberra is the capital city of which country?
